Question: This person's second holiday album Happy Christmas was released under eleveneleven and Primary Wave in November 2010.
Hints: This person was featured on The Oprah Winfrey Show, The Ellen DeGeneres Show, The View, The Price of Beauty, and The Early Show.
On July 19, 2008, this person performed at the Country Thunder Festival in Wisconsin.
This person has stated that they were put in groups and had acting and vocal coaches to help them.
